localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Help your friends get a job by embedding a widget on your website where you point visitors to your friends for jobs that you're not available for. Create your widget in the online generator and embed it on your website using an iframe. It's as simple as that.
blogPost.body: Help your friends get a job by embedding a widget on your website where you point visitors to your friends for jobs that you're not available for. Create your widget in the online generator and embed it on your website using an iframe. It's as simple as that.
blogPost.title: Referrer - Painlessly refer your friends for jobs
blogPost.author: Albin Groen

localize.description: 通过在你的网站上嵌入一个小工具来帮助你的朋友找到一份工作，在那里你可以把访问者引导到你的朋友那里，寻找你找不到的工作。在在线生成器中创建您的小部件，并使用IFRAME将其嵌入到您的网站上。就这么简单。
localize.tagline: 毫不费力地推荐你的朋友找工作

localize.description: 通過在你的網站上嵌入一個小工具來幫助你的朋友找到一份工作，在那裏你可以把訪問者引導到你的朋友那裏，尋找你找不到的工作。在在線生成器中創建您的小部件，並使用IFRAME將其嵌入到您的網站上。就這麼簡單。
localize.tagline: 毫不費力地推薦你的朋友找工作

previous.excerpt: Don’t waste time building admin panels for your Laravel applications. Let Invoker do the hard work for you. No coding. No setup. No stress.
previous.title: Invoker - The no-bull Laravel tool

localize.description: 不要再浪费时间为你的Laravel应用程序建立管理面板了. 让Invoker来为你做这些艰苦的工作. 无需编码. 无需设置. 没有压力.
不要再浪費時間爲你的Laravel應用程序建立管理面板了. 讓Invoker來爲你做這些艱苦的工作. 無需編碼. 無需設置. 沒有壓力.

next.excerpt: Explo lets you build customer-facing dashboards that fit seamlessly into your existing application. Connect directly to your database or warehouse, build custom-styled dashboards, and embed in your application within a day.
next.title: Explo 2.0 - Customer-facing dashboards and reports - lightning fast

localize.description: Explo可以让您建立面向客户的仪表盘，并无缝地嵌入到您现有的应用程序中。直接连接到您的数据库或仓库，建立自定义风格的仪表盘，并在一天内嵌入您的应用程序。
localize.tagline: 面向客户的仪表盘和报告--快如闪电。

localize.description: Explo可以讓您建立面向客戶的儀表盤，並無縫地嵌入到您現有的應用程序中。直接連接到您的數據庫或倉庫，建立自定義風格的儀表盤，並在一天內嵌入您的應用程序。
localize.tagline: 面向客戶的儀表盤和報告--快如閃電。
